text: Charulatha is an Indian film actress.Charulatha makes a comeback to Sandalwood She has acted in mainly Kannada, Tamil, Telugu, Odia, and Malayalam films. ==Biography== Charulatha was born in Punjab, and brought up in Kerala.Charulatha is back Her birth name is Sonia; she adopted the screen name Charulatha after entering the Kannada film industry. She started her career as a model, appearing for brands such as Malabar jewelers, Ayodhya jewelers, Saree Kendra, Ujala, Triveni agarbatti, Parthas Sarees, Roopam Sarees, Priyadarshi Tiles, Premear Hawai, Ace Motors, Hero Honda, Colors slimming Center etc.... ==Filmography == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" ! scope="col" | Film ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Language ! scope="col" | Role ! scope="col" | Director |- ! scope="row" | O Mallige | 1997 | Kannada | Mallige (Lakshmi) | V.
